verses.name: Exodus 36:34
verses.text: And he overlaid the boards with gold, and made their rings of gold to be places for the bars, and overlaid the bars with gold.

verses.name: Exodus 36:35
verses.text: And he made a vail of blue, and purple, and scarlet, and fine twined linen: with cherubims made he it of cunning work.

verses.name: Exodus 36:36
verses.text: And he made thereunto four pillars of shittim wood, and overlaid them with gold: their hooks were of gold; and he cast for them four sockets of silver.

verses.name: Exodus 36:37
verses.text: And he made an hanging for the tabernacle door of blue, and purple, and scarlet, and fine twined linen, of needlework;
